title: UFO President Samuel Adobah Receives Global Peace Advocacy Honour
description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-president-samuel-adobah-receives-global-peace-advocacy-honour/ Ghana has been ranked 61st out of 163 countries in terms of peace, dropping six places from its previous position. The country has also fallen from 4th to 7th most peaceful in Sub-Saharan Africa, reflecting concerns over rising security issues, governance, and localized tensions. This development has raised concerns among stakeholders, prompting the Universal [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-president-samuel-adobah-receives-global-peace-advocacy-honour/

title: EXCLUSIVE: UFO Vs. ARKX Space ETF Battle Reveals 'Only Pure Play' Bet on Sector
description: Since launching in 2019, the Procure Space ETF (NASDAQ:UFO) has positioned itself as the only pure‐play space ETF in the United States, holding a basket of companies with direct exposure to the space industry — a sector that could draw increased attention in 2026 if a potential SpaceX IPO materializes.Procure Holdings CEO Andrew Chanin told Benzinga that maintaining a pure‐play focus is central to the firm's identity and a key differentiator from other space‐themed ETFs.UFO Vs. ARKXThe Ark Space & Defense Innovation ETF (BATS:ARKX) launched in 2021, takes a broader approach. Unlike the Procure Space ETF, the fund from Cathie Wood's Ark Invest includes companies with lower direct exposure to space and, in some cases, stronger ties to adjacent sectors such as eVTOLs and defense."To my knowledge, UFO is the only pure play space ETF out there in the United States," Chanin told Benzinga. "That's important to us because it has to be, our fund is called the Procure Space ETF. We have the ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

title: Kenya: Pilot Spots UFO Hovering Near Private Jet
description: [Capital FM] A pilot of a private jet reported seeing a "strange, small object" floating beside his aircraft thousands of feet above Rhode Island.

title: Pilot Spots UFO Hovering Near Private Jet
description: A pilot of a private jet reported seeing a “strange, small object” floating beside his aircraft thousands of feet above Rhode Island. According to newly resurfaced audio shared in October by the YouTube channel VASAviation, the pilot contacted air traffic control at Rhode Island T.F.
